Player History
Injured on 5/30/1966 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1968, off Ted Bowsfield (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/19/1968, off Clyde Wright (BOS)...
Traded from Minnesota to Los Angeles on 7/7/1969 (Going to LA: SS D. Campbell. Going to MIN: CF M. Rivers, C T. Simmons, RF R. Zisk)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/29/1969...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1970, hitting .310 with 7 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 8/11/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1971, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...

Drove in 7 runs against Pittsburgh on 5/22/1972...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/2/1972, hitting .438 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...

Injured on 10/4/1972 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
